name: lastlarf
text: All the best road trips start out in a manner simillar to this.

name: hexjumper
text: Can't imagine why Teodor picks now, of all times, to talk like a pirate.

name: pitseleh
text: I think the question you should ask yourself is, "Why wouldn't he?"

name: norrin
text: I think he beleives this is what someone scary should sound like.

name: seph
text: WHY FIND OUT?

name: all-star951
text: BOO TO THAT

name: all-star951
text: I realize that I am 11 months late, but your reply was begging for the follow-up. My sincere apologies.

name: turnabout
text: I think future historians will note that the XFL ran its one season in 2001, and the player who named himself "He Hate Me" (and was allowed to have his uniform display it) was about the only thing the general public heard about it.

name: mortshire
text: teodor's just getting into the spirit the only way he knows how.

name: ambala
text: The Pirate Way.

name: chaesar
text:
...laugh out loud funny...

and how did Lyle get that high up? hes too fat for acrobatics.

name: paco
text: It is obvious that Lyle is doing one of the many karate ninja moves he knows, this one being the one known as "karatake no jitsu do oku"- the technique of jumping in the air while hitting a pizza delivery man with a baseball bat.

name: overmedicated
text: He just fights, man. He fights like crazy.

name: anomalous3
text: Not only is teodor a pirate, he's a pirate who talks in spoonerisms

name: catgrl131
text: Spoonerisms? What, is he really trying to say, "He mates ye"? I don't understand.

name: cproseedcakeksc
text: Could be a chess metaphor.

name: m3funkyb
text: i think it's pretty clear that lyle is standing on chairs piledon top of eachother

name: a_dude
text: let that be a lesson to all you humans.

name: a_dude
text: me hates ye too.

name: riazm
text: Imagine being hit on the head as you deliver a pizza, the last thing you see is a talking teddy bear screaming ME HATES YE!

name: mattylite
text: HOLY CHRIST IS THAT AN ALIVE STUFFED ANIMAL

name: lucid
text: I would certainly be regretting all the times I made my teddy bears engage in mock combat against one another. Especially so since the monkey always kicked the bear's ass. But he had such longer legs and arms and a tail!

name: alejandroadam
text: in my mind this is what Onstad looks like. a pale outline man.

name: evolume
text: I thought it was Steven the strong, nice waiter, working his night job.

name: jaiden
text: Ever since I first read this strip, "Me hates ye!" has found its way into my normal speech.  I just giggle every time I read it here.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: seconded. best thing outta T's mouth ever.

name: zedpower
text: "Me hates ye!" ranks about equal with "Food chain! Deal with it!" on the "uncalled for" scale.

name: greymantledwolf
text: catcarjacking.

name: joeyramoney
text: this made me laugh until i soiled myself.

name: i_love_kate
text: People with avatars of Phillipe always seem to post comments that gel with said avatars in an incessantly comic way.

name: hellofditties
text: I laughed for so long at Teodore's line, then became really confused.  I thought I'd best give it a five, just to be safe...

name: snowman
text: First appearance of a human?

name: shoinan
text: Steven and Stanley Tucci would have something to say about that.

name: deusoma
text: Stanley Tucci never actually appeared.

name: shoinan
text: Noted with a capital Dangit.

name: caddon
text:
And as the poor delivery man slips into concussion, his last thoughts are a false mental image of his attacker.

Crafty, that Teodor...

name: luckypyjamas
text:
oh, but he did not slip into a concussion

read on...

name: baryonyx
text: You know, someday I'm going to make a habit of cracking the door for pizza deliverymen and telling then to leave it on the doormat because I am terribly deformed, just because I can .

name: tripperday
text:
That's okay, but what's really fun is getting your whole apartment building to start doing it.

You don't even have to crack the door if they can hear you yelling with the door closed because most places take credit cards over the phone now.

name: chachibenji
text:
"ookgh"
And so the onomotoparade begins.

name: direhaggis
text: Teodor is sassy and has hella sack.

name: em2
text: A great beginning.

name: atticusonline
text: Goodness, how high can Lyle jump? Is he standing on Teodor's head? STAY TUNED TO FIND OUT

name: milo
text: classic gag revamped
